Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Combat Swords)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.ca7rf45gdzJ559fC]{Sword Martial Arts}

Benefits

When wielding a shortsword, bastard sword, broadsword, longsword, great sword, khepesh, or maquahuitl the character gains +1 damage die, and when performing a thrust attack, the character takes no damage penalty, and gains a +2 damage bonus.
